description: This table contains the history of hospital billing detail bills for a given hospital account.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HBP_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The hospital billing print record ID.

columns.name: EB_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The enterprise statement/detail bill ID.

columns.name: BILL_RUN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The run type of the detail bill.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Statement


Hospital Account Detail Bill


Guarantor Detail Bill


Claim Detail Bill

columns.name: IS_DEMAND_YN
columns.description:
Flag to indicate whether this detail bill was produced on demand instead of as part of a batch.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ACCEPT_DATE
columns.description: The date the detail bill was accepted.

columns.name: BATCH_DATE
columns.description: The batch date of the detail bill.

columns.name: DELIVERY_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
How the detail bill was delivered.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Paper, No Electronic Notification


Paperless, No Electronic Notification


Paper and Electronic Notification


Paperless, Electronic Notification

columns.name: CREATION_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who created the detail bill.

columns.name: TOT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The sum of all charges on the detail bill.

columns.name: TOT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The sum of all payments on the detail bill.

columns.name: TOT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The sum of all adjustments on the detail bill.

columns.name: INSURANCE_BALANCE
columns.description: The total amount of the detail bill that is currently with insurance.

columns.name: PATIENT_BALANCE
columns.description: The total amount of the detail bill that is currently in self-pay.

columns.name: PATIENT_AMOUNT_DUE
columns.description: The total amount due for this detail bill.

columns.name: MYC_NOTIFICATION_SENT_YN
columns.description:
*** Deprecated *** This column has been deprecated, as this information is already available in STMT_PRINT.IS_MYCHART_NOTIF_YN. You can join to this table by using the column HSP_ACCT_DETAIL_BILL_HXN.EB_PRINT_ID. ****** Stores if the detail bill notification was sent via MyChart.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_DEMAND_YN

columns.name: FORCE_TO_PAPER_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
*** Deprecated *** This column was incorrectly marked as containing EHI so it has been deprecated. ****** Stores the reason why the detail bill was sent via paper.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Paperless Billing is disabled for the service area


User specified


Forced to paper because of self-pay follow-up level


Forced to paper because of guarantor rule


Forced to paper because of hospital account rule


Guarantor declined paperless billing


Financial Assistance Program Not Allowed In MyChart


Not self-pay correspondence


Form is not allowed to be displayed in MyChart


Guarantor missing associated patient or MyChart account


Guarantor is not MyChart active


Guarantor is not available in MyChart


No access to billing features in MyChart


MyChart tickler could not be sent


Professional billing letter not marked as Sent


Patient is not active on MyChart


Queued for printing based on estimate rule


Patient is deceased

columns.name: FIRST_MYC_VIEW_DTTM
columns.description: *** Deprecated *** This column was incorrectly marked as containing EHI so it has been deprecated. ****** Stores the instant the detail was first viewed in MyChart.

columns.name: LAST_MYC_VIEW_DTTM
columns.description: *** Deprecated *** This column was incorrectly marked as containing EHI so it has been deprecated. ****** Stores the instant the detail was last viewed in MyChart.
